docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Although public service advertising provides some of television's most powerful imagery, the gut-wrenching scenes of tearful teen-age alcoholics and drug-overdose victims shrouded in black body bags are not persuading people to make long-term changes in their behavior, says a new study by the Harvard School of Public Health.

headline.main: Talking Too Tough on Life's Risks?

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Name almost any ailment and you can be sure that some green plant is purported to cure or alleviate the condition.
